title: Signature result
name: signatureResult
description: A signatureRequest event is invoked during transaction when signature verification is needed (f.ex when payment is done with a magstripe card). The merchant is required to ask the cardholder for signature and approve (or disapprove) the signature. signatureResult tells the card reader if the signature was approved by passing true in the method. To disapprove then false is passed.

parameters.name: accepted
parameters.notes: pass true if merchant accepts customer signature

elements.name: currentTransactionStatus
elements.description: Invoked while during transaction with different statuses from card reader

elements.name: endOfTransaction
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

title: Signature result
name: signatureResult
description: A signatureRequest event is invoked during transaction when signature verification is needed (f.ex when payment is done with a magstripe card). The merchant is required to ask the cardholder for signature and approve (or disapprove) the signature. signatureResult tells the card reader if the signature was approved by passing true in the method. To disapprove then false is passed.

parameters.name: accepted
parameters.notes: pass true if merchant accepts customer signature

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This is used if you want to send the operation to a specific device. Recommended if you are using multiple devices

elements.name: currentTransactionStatus
elements.description: Invoked while during transaction with different statuses from card reader

elements.name: endOfTransaction
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device
